column2: ENGLISH
All my illnesses have been cured by a magic spell !
I feel alive!
Your liege is asking for a heal spell to be casted on [From.GetTitledFirstName]
At once !
You cast a spell to veil your appearance with magic to beautiful in the eyes of others.
Perfect!
Under your orders, your court magician cast a spell to predict any danger to you.
Hmm...
You cast a spell to predict any danger to you.
Under your lieges orders you cast a spell to predict any danger to [From.GetHerHim].
I'm now protected from any danger by a spell !
Nothing will harm me now !
Your liege is asking for a protection spell to be casted on [From.GetTitledFirstName]
At once !
You now realize that your bad opinion of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was misguided, [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] is actually really charming.
This is a strange feeling...
Your liege is asking for a charm spell to be casted on [From.GetTitledFirstName]
At once !
The court magician started to chant a spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls.
Perfect.
You started to chant a spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName].

Your lieges ordered you assist the siege of [Root.Siege.GetName]. You started to chant a spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName].
The enemies had a sorcerer who apparently cast some kind of spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName].
Damn.

The court magician started to chant a spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball in front of them. Then they chanted something and the ball of flames crashed in the walls with a huge explosion.
Burn!

You started to chant a spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball in front of you. Then you chanted something and the ball of flames crashed in the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] with huge explosion.

Your lieges ordered you assist the siege of [Root.Siege.GetName]. You started to chant a spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball in front of you. Then you chanted something and the ball of flames crashed in the walls with a huge explosion.

The enemies had a sorcerer who apparently cast some kind of spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball within the enemy camp. Then the ball of flames crashed in the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] with huge explosion.
The court magician started to chant a spell. The earth suddenly stated to quake with shambles of rock flying everywhere. The walls crumbled and many fell to their deaths.
Need to hold on to something.
You started to chant a spell. The earth suddenly stated to quake with shambles of rock flying everywhere. The walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] crumbled and many fell to their deaths.

Your lieges ordered you assist the siege of [Root.Siege.GetName]. You started to chant a spell. The earth suddenly stated to quake with shambles of rock flying everywhere. The walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] crumbled and many fell to their deaths.

The enemies had a sorcerer who apparently cast some kind of spell. The earth suddenly stated to quake with shambles of rock flying everywhere. The walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] crumbled and many fell to their deaths.

The court magician started to chant a spell. The sky became cloudy and wind grew in strength. Soon a storm started - lightning struck the enemies troops and wind pushed them down from walls and against each other.
My job is done.

You started to chant a spell. The sky became cloudy and wind grew in strength. Soon a storm started in [Root.Siege.GetName] - lightning struck the enemies troops and wind pushed them down from walls and against each other.

Your lieges ordered you assist the siege of [Root.Siege.GetName]. You started to chant a spell. The sky became cloudy and wind grew in strength. Soon a storm started in [Root.Siege.GetName] - lightning struck the enemies troops and wind pushed them down from walls and against each other.

The enemies had a sorcerer who apparently cast some kind of spell. The sky became cloudy and wind grew in strength. Soon a storm started in [Root.Siege.GetName] - lightning struck the our troops and wind pushed them down from walls and against each other.
The court magician started to chant a spell. It started to snow and becoming colder. And soon it was frozen all over.
Damn, it's cold.
